item.title: Code Halos are the key to achieving success in business, according to Cognizant
item.description:
Cognizant Technology Solutions claims that the most successful businesses are using a new concept called “Code Halo” to gain a competitive advantage. This concept revolves around leveraging digital data, such as clicks, swipes, likes, purchases, comments, and searches, to understand individual preferences and behaviors. Source: Cognizant. Roehrig. item.title: I'm not sure if my implementation methodology is working properly.
item.description:
Christina and Steve rarely collaborate on blog posts due to the coordination involved, but they decided to team up to address common project failures. They believe that most project issues stem from flawed methodologies rather than individual mistakes. A structured implementation methodology like Sure Step can help avoid these problems. Steve recounts instances where partners sought his help on troubled projects, needing him to fix integrations or customizations urgently and at discounted rates...
